text.value: _Educate other household members on TB prevention and refer all over 5 years to the SCHW home for sputum collection. For children under 5 years refer them to the health facility for IPT and submit a TB contact tracing form._
Are there other family members living in the same household as ?
Have you referred any under 5 or other household members to the health facility?
Tasks will appear when follow up is needed.
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
_Refer and accompany to the health facility for further management._
Educate the client on health behaviors using TB counselling cards
Does have any other illness that needs medical attention?
_Refer to the health facility for further management._
_Refer and accompany to the health facility for further management._
Educate the client on TB drugs side effects using TB counselling cards
None cannot be selected with any other option!
Is experiencing any of the following signs?
Does have any challenges taking their medication?
_Plan to accompany on their next appointment._
_Give hope using Joseph's story in the TB counselling cards._
Date cannot be in the past!
When is the next appointment date?
Educate new patients using TB counselling cards

_Phunzitsani anthu ena pa banjapo za kapewedwe ka TB ndikutumiza onse oposera zaka 5 kukhomo kwa a SCHW kuti akapeleke makhololo. Kwa ana ochepera zaka 5 atumizeni ku chipatala kuti akalandire mankhwala oteteza ku TB kenako perekani chikalata chotumizira anthu a pabanja kuchipatala pomwe papezeka munthu wa TB yopezeka m'makhololo._
Kodi pali anthu ena pabanjapo omwe amakhala limodzi ndi ?
Matenda opezerapo mwayi chifukwa cha kuchepa kwa chitetezo cha mthupi
Kodi mwatumiza mwana ochepera zaka zisanu kapena wina wa pabanja kuchipatala?
Palibe matenda opezerapo mwayi chifukwa cha kuchepa kwa chitetezo m'thupi
Matenda opezerapo mwayi chifukwa cha kuchepa kwa chitetezo m'thupi alipo
**_Kulumikiza anthu ena apabanja kuchipatala pa nkhani ya TB_**
_Tumizani ndi kuperekeza kuchipatala kuti akalndire thandizo._
Phunzitsani za m'mene angazisamalilire pogwilitsa ntchito ma kadi ophunzitsira a TB
Kodi ali matenda ena ofunika thandizo lachipatala machangu?
Matenda opezerapo mwayi chifukwa cha kuchepa kwa chitetezo cha mthupi
Phunzitsani za zizindikilo zachilendo zobwera kamba komwa mankhwala a TB pogwilitsa ntchito ma kadi ophunzitsira
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china
Kodi akukumana ndi mavuto ena alionse kamba komwa mankhwala a TB?
Kufufuza zizindikiro zowopsa zodza kamba komwa mankhwala a TB
Kodi akukumana ndi mavuto ena alionse kamba kakumwa mankhwalawa?
Perekani uthenga wachilimbikitso kwa odwala pogwiritsa ntchito nkhani ya Josefe.
Phunzitsani odwala atsopano pogwiritsa ntchito ma kadi ophunzitsira a TB

bind.calculate: if(selected(../side_effects, 'difficulty_breathing') or selected(../side_effects, 'hearing_loss') or selected(../side_effects, 'jaundice') or selected(../side_effects, 'vision_loss') or selected(../side_effects, 'vomiting') or selected(../side_effects, 'rash'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../side_effects, 'muscle_or_joint_pain') or selected(../side_effects, 'difficulty_swallowing') or selected(../side_effects, 'weakness_or_fatigue') or selected(../side_effects, 'loss_of_appetite') or selected(../side_effects, 'swollen_eyes') or selected(../side_effects, 'swollen_tongue') or selected(../side_effects, 'numbness_of_feet') or selected(../side_effects, 'dizziness') and ../refer_and_accompany = 'no', 'yes', 'no')
